divs: sighting detailsi was traveling north on 127 in ingham county in lansing, mi. i had just passed the jolly road exit. a few moments after i had passed the jolly road exit, i noticed what appeared to be a silvery\grey object in the with orange in, and around it. the object resembled a fighter plane, with a bubble dome from my view point. traveling north, i saw this object to my left slightly. you could say directional wise it was ne. i can guess as to where it was landing. it was well before the 496 entrance ramp, so anywhere in the area of fenner arboretum or maybe even more east as there is unpopulated land there. if this object were a plane, it would've definately crashed, no doubt about it. the only other thing i can guess is that it was a helicopter making a rescue, but i heard no helicopter noise, and at its altitude, you should've heard it. the time was between 12:20 and 12:45. the time above is guestimate. thank you
Summary: Orange like color almost appearing to be a flame on a craft descending.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There were no other sightings in Lansing on or around February 8th 2012
